title: Here's your bike, Ed!
creator_credit: Steve Westh, John Taylor, Taylormade Films and Vic Roads
brief_description: The purpose of this title is to demonstrate a variety of skills that children need to cycle safely on roads. Designed to accompany a Bike Ed program in schools, with Teacher’s notes, there are a variety of activities and drills which will develop children’s confidence as bike riders and users of the road.
